comment: Mandalorian Chapter is Wednesday , and watching past the credits apparently has something special in stored . I wonder why it was moved up and received special attention , hhhmmmm , could something be happening on Thursday ?
amr:
# ::snt Mandalorian Chapter is Wednesday , and watching past the credits apparently has something special in stored . I wonder why it was moved up and received special attention , hhhmmmm , could something be happening on Thursday ?
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (p / publication
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Mandalorian"
                        :op2 "Chapter")
                  :time (d / date-entity
                        :weekday (w / wednesday)))
            :op2 (a2 / appear-02
                  :ARG1 (h / have-03
                        :ARG0 (w2 / watch-01
                              :ARG1 (p2 / past
                                    :op1 (c / credit)))
                        :ARG1 (s / something
                              :ARG1-of (s2 / special-02)
                              :ARG1-of (s3 / store-01)))))
      :snt2 (w3 / wonder-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :ARG0-of (c2 / cause-01
                        :ARG1 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (m2 / move-01
                                    :ARG1 (ii2 / it)
                                    :direction (u / up))
                              :op2 (r / receive-01
                                    :ARG1 (a4 / attend-02
                                          :ARG1 ii2
                                          :ARG1-of (s4 / special-02))))))
            :snt3 (p3 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (e / event
                        :time (d2 / date-entity
                              :weekday (t2 / thursday)))
                  :polarity (a5 / amr-unknown)
                  :mod (h2 / hmm
                        :mode expressive))))

comment: It was moved up because of Rise of Skywalker , I'm guessing that the credit will be a preview of some sort for the movie
amr:
# ::snt It was moved up because of Rise of Skywalker , I'm guessing that the credit will be a preview of some sort for the movie
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (m2 / move-01
            :ARG1 (ii / it)
            :ARG2 (u / up)
            :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (w / work-of-art
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Rise"
                              :op2 "of"
                              :op3 "Luke"))))
      :snt2 (g / guess-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (p / preview-01
                  :ARG0 (c2 / credit-01)
                  :ARG1 (m3 / movie)
                  :mod (s / sort
                        :mod (s2 / some)))))
